name: GREATER WENATCHEE IRRIGATION DISTRICT
description: GWID provides irrigation water to farmers in the Wenatchee, Washington area.
sampleDescriptions: Track implementation of Water Infrastructure Improvements for the Nation Act (WIIN Act) PL 114-322

Assist with Bureau of Reclamation and Congress on title transfer legislation.
